lead_paragraph: Troubled, homeless 15-year-old Joshua (Josh Hutcherson,‘The Hunger Games’) lives from hand to mouth on the streets. He lands in Carmel by the Sea, a small town in California known for its local art community, where his prodigious art skill is disco
